audioworkstation.libs.sublibs.standardmidifile module¶

Analyze MIDI files according to SMF (Standard MIDI File) format.

reference:

MIDI1.0規格書(日本語版98.1) ISBN4-8456-0348-9 C3055 http://www.amei.or.jp/

2 MIDI 1.0 4 スタンダードMIDIファイル1.0

class StandardMidiFile¶

ベースクラス: object

StandardMidiFile.

パラメータ:

midifile (pathlib.Path) --

channels_preset()¶

Get a list of preset numbers for each of the 16 channels.

戻り値:

instruments()¶

Get a list of instrument names for each of the 16 channels.

戻り値:

lyrics()¶

Get lyrics list.

戻り値:

title()¶

Get Title.

戻り値:

total_tick()¶

Count ticks.

戻り値:

Module contents¶

Packages of support modules

parts: Gain control for MIDI devices
standardmidifile: Parsing SMF(Standard MIDI File) files
